# An Introduction to Slumdown

### A Hugo theme and R package by [Danielle Navarro](https://twitter.com/djnavarro)

<img src="header/slumdown.png" width="150px" style="float:right; padding:15px;">

<br>

The idea behind *slumdown* is to provide an R package and Hugo theme designed to work together when writing a *blogdown* site (see the [about](about/) page for more detail). The posts listed below area work in progress, but are intended to serve as a succinct introduction and how-to guide.
